meanings.definition: A design consisting of two or more letters combined into one symbol
meanings.sent1: I received a beautiful monogram on my birthday cake.
meanings.sent2: She embroidered her initials to create a monogram on her backpack.
meanings.sent3: The monogram on his shirt made him feel like a fancy prince.
meanings.sent4: Her monogram was like a secret code that only she understood.
meanings.sent5: The monogram on the necklace sparkled in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.
